project_descr: The conference of the parties (COP) to the UNFCCC has adapted a forestry GHG emission mitigation mechanism known as REDD+. This is defined as Policy approaches and positive incentives on issues relating conservation,

outputs.output_descr: Bangladeshis one of the most climate vulnerable countries in the world. Climate change and variability have had an impact on the lives and livelihoods of people living in coastal areas and in aid and semi-aid regions of Bangladesh.
